attributes.action: carrying a knife  should serve a minimum mandatory sentence of 5 years
attributes.additional_details: Our children are dyeing our children are killing every day another young child has been fatally stabbed or stabbed even a kitchen knife can do incredible damage if it carries the same charge as a firearm children might think twice about carrying and you save 2 lives 1 from death and 1 from a life in prison
attributes.background: Change the laws and sentencing on knife crime it's as dangerous as a firearm and is causing as many deaths it should be held the same
